channel.title: Approving help
channel.description: Hi guys so I registered my server on the moparscape server status thingy. And now it's asking me to approve it. It has given me a username and password for my server but I don't know were to approve it? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Approving help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you misread I never called him stupid… btw u make no sense because he posted on the topic himself that he was

Read full topic

item.title: Approving help
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

No, calling him stupid is not help.

item.title: Approving help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:9, topic:416731”]You shoulden’t freak out then. We are a community here and as a community, it is our job to help. You are probably at his stage also so shush.

OT: TBH, im having problems with the status page also… im just waiting it out to see what will happen :o[/quote]

umm no I was trying to help him out, but he still doesn’t get it!

Read full topic
